# endGlanceUpdates()

**Instance Method**

Tells the system that you finished updating your glance content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func endGlanceUpdates()
```

## Discussion

When all outstanding calls to the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKInterfaceController/beginGlanceUpdates()] method are balanced with calls to this method, WatchKit displays your updated glance interface.

## Deprecated symbols

- **Text Response Key**: Keys for retrieving text response information.
- **addMenuItem(withImageNamed:title:action:)**: Adds an action to the context menu using an existing image resource in your Watch app bundle.
- **addMenuItem(with:title:action:)**: Adds an action to the context menu using a system-provided icon.
- **addMenuItem(with:title:action:)**: Adds an action to the context menu by using an image provided by your WatchKit extension.
- **beginGlanceUpdates()**: Tells the system that you are about to start a potentially lengthy update task for your glance.
- **clearAllMenuItems()**: Removes all programmatically added actions from the context menu.
- **handleUserActivity(_:)**: Responds to Handoff–related activity.
- **presentController(_:)**: Presents a page-based interface modally.
- **reloadRootControllers(withNames:contexts:)**: Loads the specified interface controllers and rebuilds the app’s page-based interface.
- **updateUserActivity(_:userInfo:webpageURL:)**: Registers the current user activity with the system.
- **WKMenuItemIcon**: Template images that you can use for menus.
